text: Not the world's greatest pizza, but they're consistently good. Ordered probably a dozen pizzas from them over the last 6-8 months, and have never had a problem.  Deliveries are on time or early.  Last order was a pizza and a 2L of soda.  Soda was still cold, and the pizza was still so hot  I had to let it cool down on the counter.
